rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that seamlessly transitions into a spacious living area designed with natural light, large windows, and an open plan layout to ensure ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen that promotes social interaction while allowing ample sunlight.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated, quiet home office area with north-facing windows ensuring natural light and minimal distractions. Equipped with built-in storage solutions.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom & Utility
rooms.description: A functional guest bathroom with a small utility closet, adhering to Vastu principles for cleanliness and auspicious flow of energy.

openings.description: Double door entry promoting easy access and inviting natural light into the entrance hall.
Large window offering panoramic views of the garden with effective cross ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony, south-facing windows for optimum sunlight, and built-in closet.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Well-lit guest room with functional window placements ensuring natural ventilation and privacy.

openings.description: Door leading to a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Large window designed for natural light and ventilation in guest room.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace & Garden
rooms.description: A multi-functional rooftop terrace that integrates a lush garden area, seating space, and a mini-barbecue zone. Emphasizes natural ventilation with retractable covers for weather adaptability.

openings.description: Secure and aesthetically pleasing access ladder leading to the rooftop terrace.
Large skylight for natural lighting of both interior spaces below and open terrace area.

notes: The design emphasizes natural light, ventilation, and adherence to Vastu principles. The integration of a large garden and dedicated home office supports modern urban living while reflecting traditional Chettinad elegance.
